Name: Crystal Skill: Glory Wing
Desc:
Imbues the full power of magic from the Crystal to the wings. Enhances Invoke: Javelin to Glory Wing: Javelin, making it prioritize tracking Boss Monsters with the highest Max HP and explode.
During Glory Wing, using Crystal Portal with a directional key quickly teleports you in the selected direction. To cancel this skill's effect, use it again.
Glory Wing isn't affected by Buff Duration Bonuses and automatically summons Crystal and Makina at the end of its duration.
Required Crystal Charge: 150
